name: TERMINUS (itch)
description:
TERMINUS
Pop Quiz Hot Shot!
There's a bomb on the bus.
You can't go under 50.

Help Keanu and Sandra dodge obstacles and take care of everyone's business on the bus.

Tip: Don't blow up!


Note: Requires a controller, supports XBOX and PS4 controllers!

Instructions: Control the bus with the left stick and SPEED up with the Left Trigger. Move Keanu with the right stick and use the Right Trigger buttons to interact with passengers - calm down the stressed dude, make sure the driver survives and flirt with Sandra to keep her happy!

Made in about two days for the A Game by its Cover jam, during the yearly Tribute Games jam! Art by Stéphane Boutin & Dom2D, code by JF Major, and music/sound by Jean Chan. Check out Tribute Games' games, especially the brand new Curses N' Chaos :)
